Javascript Meetup.title: Javascript Meetup
Javascript Meetup.summary: A time for new and experienced Javascript devs to meet, talk, and discuss coding.

comments.author: Andrew
comments.message: Looking forward to seeing you all there!

Friday Pub Night.title: Friday Pub Night
Friday Pub Night.summary: Let's socialize! Want to meet with others and commiserate about coding woes, or just talk about anything at all. Relax!

comments.author: Andrew
comments.message: Anybody know which pub to go to?

comments.author: Ann
comments.message: Let's try the quiet one with the big fireplace
